summary.span: 用作充当 （或者其他服务器或用户）控件的容器的所有区域控件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for (or other server or user) controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件控件集，区域是呈现为 HTML 表，其中包含 Web 页的定义的区域中的其他控件的复合控件。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page. 类是继承自基类的区域类，并提供一组基本的行为的派生区域包含控件、 服务器控件和用户控件。The class is a zone that inherits from the base class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls, server controls, and user controls. 组合区域与（和其他服务器） 的 Web 部件应用程序，用户与大多数情况下进行交互的页面的普通视图的主用户界面窗体的控件。The combination of zones with (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time. 所有区域为它们所包含的控件都提供一组通用的 UI 元素。All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain. 普遍适用于所有区域的 UI 元素的详细讨论，请参阅类概述主题面向类。For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 区域包括一个包含服务器控件和一个关联的正文节对象用于呈现所包含的控件和其 chrome 元素，例如其谓词、 边框和等等。The zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on. 除了继承自的功能类，类添加了客户端控件拖动、 特定谓词 （以启用公共用户界面操作如最小化、 关闭、 删除和编辑控件），以及其他样式功能。In addition to the features inherited from the class, the class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features. 类也是类继承，如果你想要设计数据库驱动的自定义区域。The class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven. 例如，可以创建自定义天气 Web 部件区域继承，并且设计为包含以及提供布局功能和其他服务的是数据绑定和显示天气信息的控件。For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from , and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for controls that are data-bound and display weather information. 类包含多个用于处理与区域中的样式特性的属性。The class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone. 有几个属性的边框，包括和。There are several properties for borders, including and . 没有使用如出现一个区域，请在标头中的菜单的样式特性的属性的一组， ，等等。There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as , , and others. 类还包含用于处理区域中的谓词的成员数。The class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone. 这些成员与区域中的部件控件显示的谓词。These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone. 在区域级别的谓词可以添加到区域，默认情况下它们不具有任何。While zone-level verbs can be added to zones, by default they do not have any. 还有一组提供的 Web 部件控件集与部件控件一起使用的标准谓词和开发人员可以添加自定义谓词以及。There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well. 使用谓词的一些重要属性包括之类的某些标准谓词对象的引用的属性， ， ，和， ，并。Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as , , , and , , and . 标准谓词 （通常为下拉列表菜单在 UI 中显示） 的谓词菜单上显示的区域中包含的每个控件的标题栏中。The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone. 此外，还有属性，可用于确定什么类型的可单击的对象表示在 UI 中的谓词。There is also a property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI. 使用谓词的其他关键成员包括方法，即可以被覆盖的谓词创建过程的自定义处理的事件处理程序和事件。Other key members for working with verbs include the method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the event. 类用于处理包含大量成员区域中包含的控件。The class contains a number of members for working with controls contained within a zone. 属性引用的所有集合（和其他服务器） 区域中的控件。The property references the collection of all (and other server) controls in the zone. 多个方法对应于用户可以在上执行的标准谓词或操作控件在区域中，如， ，和。Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on controls in a zone, such as , , and . 也有中的成员数类，需考虑如何布局或在区域内排列控件。There are also a number of members in the class that concern how the controls are laid out or arranged within the zone. 属性确定控件是否可以在区域之间移动或重新排列区域中的用户。The property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users. 属性允许您确定是否水平或垂直排列区域中的控件。The property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically. > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer 可能会呈现的高度或其包含的控件以意外方式，具体取决于区域的方向。Internet Explorer might render the height of a or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档或属性。For more details, see the documentation for the or the properties. 中的其他方法类为您提供各个区域的区域呈现的详细编程控制。Other methods in the class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone. 许多这些方法重写基方法继承自类中，以自定义的区域，包含呈现控件。Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain controls. 重要的方法包括， ， ，和。Important methods include , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 此代码演示如何派生类中， ，用于以声明方式在 Web 部件页中包含控件。The code shows how a derived class, , is used declaratively in a Web Parts page to contain controls. 代码示例具有四个部分： 前三个部分介绍了代码文件，并第四个说明如何运行代码。The code example has four sections: the first three sections describe the code files, and the fourth explains how to run the code. 代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够将页切换到不同的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch the page into different display modes. Web 部件显示模式，并说明此控件中的代码的详细信息，请参阅[演练：更改显示模式同时适用于 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on Web Parts display modes and a description of the code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#10)] 代码示例的第二部分是包含用于处理事件的主 Web 页面的代码的代码旁置文件。The second part of the code example is a code-beside file that contains the code to handle events for the main Web page. 此文件中的代码演示如何使用一些重要的成员以编程方式。The code in this file shows how to work with some of the key members programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview.vb#4)] 代码示例的第三个部分是包含的 Web 页面控件显示基行为类，和区域中包含的控件。The third part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls that exhibit behavior from the base class, and controls contained in the zones. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的网页。Load the Web page in a browser. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件切换到设计模式下的页上，单击控件，并将其拖动可见区域之间的尝试。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into design mode, click the controls, and try dragging them between the visible zones. 单击在页上，若要查看使用的各个成员的效果的按钮的一些类。Click some of the buttons on the page to see the effect of using various members of the class. 接下来，切换到编辑模式的页。Next, switch the page to edit mode. 请确保控件位于`WebPartZone2`，单击该控件的标题栏上的谓词菜单，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。Make sure a control is positioned in `WebPartZone2`, click the verbs menu on the control's title bar, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 完成编辑该控件，并编辑其他区域中的控件之一。Finish editing that control, and then edit one of the controls in the other zone. 为你执行这些步骤，请注意，在用户界面样式的控件和区域中的差异是使用的各个成员的效果类。As you carry out these steps, notice the differences in the UI styles of the controls and the zones, which are the effect of using the various members of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性才会生效，仅当区域在页显示模式下在其中该区域中控件的布局可以更改，如。The property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as . 当设置为`false`在给定区域上，有多个最终用户不能从该区域中控件上执行的操作：When is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone: - 用户不能将控件拖动到另一个区域、 重新排列该区域内的控件或控件移到该区域。Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone. - 多个属性的影响的用户界面 (UI) 的区域中的控件已禁用，以便用户无法编辑这些属性，而使用正在编辑控件和控件。A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the and controls. - 用户不能将新控件添加到区域中，从控件。Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a control. - 关闭、 删除、 最小化，并还原谓词不会显示该区域中控件。The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone. 尽管属性会影响最终用户能够更改通过用户界面区域的布局，它不会影响能够以编程方式更改布局。Although the property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically. 例如，如果设置为`false`，用户无法关闭区域中的控件，但开发人员仍可以调用方法关闭以编程方式控制。For example, if is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the method to close controls programmatically. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用属性上的控件。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页，请参阅类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，属性设置为`true`，这是默认设置。Notice that the property is set to `true`, which is the default. 如果更改为值`false`，在将页加载到浏览器并切换到设计模式中显示的页面后，你将不能将控件拖动到内部还是`WebPartZone2`区域。If you change the value to `false`, after you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you will not be able to drag controls within or into the `WebPartZone2` zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用的关闭谓词属性将显示在每个谓词菜单区域中的控件。The close verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs menu of each control in a zone. 关闭控件将其从删除交互在页上，但如果开发人员提供相应的用户界面 (UI)，例如包含区域控件，用户可以切换到页并添加一个以前返回到页的控件的已关闭的实例。Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a zone that contains a control, a user can switch the page into and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性上的控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 若要运行的代码示例，您需要的示例部分中的所有代码属性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分取自分部类，并包含帮助谓词是启用还是禁用状态之间切换的代码。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the help verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 代码示例的另一部分是承载自定义控件，并包含用户界面的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the UI. 请注意，声明性``区域中的元素设置表示关闭谓词中的谓词菜单的特定文本控件。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the close verb in the verbs menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 另请注意，因为基础的自定义-名为控件`TextDisplayWebPart`-使用中的代码示例集属性设置为`false`其构造函数中``目录中的元素必须设置属性设置为`true`，以便可以在下面的代码示例中关闭该控件。Notice also that, because the underlying custom control--named `TextDisplayWebPart`-- used in the code example sets the property to `false` in its constructor, the `` element in the catalog must set the property to `true`, so that the control can be closed in the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#3)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，将页切换到目录显示模式，并添加`TextDisplayWebPart`到页面的控件。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 可以使用复选框来启用和禁用关闭谓词，你可以单击**关闭 web 部件**以关闭该控件的谓词菜单中的谓词。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the close verb, and you can click the **Close WebPart** verb in the verbs menu to close the control. 如果将页返回到目录显示模式，则关闭该控件后，可以单击**页目录**，选择的原始实例`TextDisplayWebPart`控制您关闭并重新打开它的页上。After you close the control, if you return the page to catalog display mode, you can click the **Page Catalog**, select the original instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control that you closed, and reopen it on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要关闭某个最终用户的典型方式控件是通过单击关闭谓词控件的标题栏中。The typical way for an end user to close a control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar. 方法调用方法类，该类执行关闭该控件的操作。The method calls the method on the class, which carries out the action of closing the control. 该方法应仅用于通过派生如区域。The method should only be used by derived zones such as . 已关闭控件不呈现在页面上。A closed control is not rendered on a page. 相反，它被添加到页目录中，这会保存在页面上所有已关闭的控件的列表。Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page. 如果 Web 部件页，用户在其关闭控件还具有``元素声明与，则用户可以将页切换到目录显示模式，并将已关闭的控件添加回页面。If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `` element declared with a , then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 用户将无法关闭控件，在控件上的属性和对区域的属性必须同时设置为`true`。For a user to be able to close a control, the property on the control and the property on the zone must both be set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基方法创建的一套区域中包含的控件。The method overrides the base method to create the set of controls contained in a zone. 发生这种情况时 Web 部件页处于设计模式，因为可以在设计模式下更改控件的页上 （和区域内） 的布局。This occurs when the Web Parts page is in design mode, because the layout of the controls on the page (and within zones) can be changed in design mode. 一套同样必须创建在区域内的控件以适应可能按顺序或区域中控件的匹配项的更改。The set of controls within a zone must likewise be created to accommodate possible changes in the order or occurrence of controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面开发人员可以将一个处理程序添加到此事件，并附加到的其他自定义谓词子区域。Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a child zone. 区域创建谓词时引发事件发生阶段的页处理，或在回发事件。The event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the stage of page processing, or during postback events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一种创建处理程序方法事件通过重写方法将自定义谓词添加到派生区域。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 代码示例包含两个源文件。The code example contains two source files. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 代码示例的第一部分是的一个简单的控件派生自的源代码类。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 代码示例的第二部分是为派生的源代码重写的区域方法将自定义谓词添加到区域。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 该代码还在谓词菜单中的创建将显示自定义谓词控件包含在该区域，并且此谓词创建另一个副本的当前控件。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 代码示例的第三个部分是承载派生的区域的网页和控件。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 页面顶部附近是`Register`指令以引用派生的区域的组件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果在浏览器页面加载控件出现在该区域。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 单击谓词菜单中，然后单击**CopyWebPart**谓词，并创建控件的副本。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件 chrome 是指每个帧的外围用户界面 (UI) 元素区域中的控件。Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each control in a zone. 对于 chrome控件包括其边框、 标题栏、 图标、 标题文本和谓词菜单的标题栏中显示。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. Chrome 的外观设置区域级别和适用于所有区域中的控件。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all controls in a zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对象会影响的整个呈现控制，而不仅仅是其 chrome 元素。The object affects the entire rendering of the controls, not merely their chrome elements. 若要使用方法，必须创建一个自定义对象可以在某个区域中定义的 Web 部件控件的 chrome 外观。To use the method, you must create a custom object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone. 你还必须创建继承的自定义区域类，并重写能够替换自定义镶边对象并将其应用到该区域中控件的方法。You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the class and overrides the method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用的 delete 谓词属性将显示每个动态的标题栏中的谓词下拉列表菜单中区域中的控件。The delete verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic control in a zone. 删除谓词不是静态控件 （在 Web 页的标记中声明的控件） 上提供的。The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page). 谓词在谓词菜单中显示页面时才在显示模式，使你能够更改页面布局，如或。The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as or . 永久删除控件从一个页面中删除该控件的实例。Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page. 与关闭的控件，永远不会返回到页添加控件的已删除的实例。Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page. 当用户删除控件，并将切换到一个页面，如果区域包含控件中，已删除的控件实例不可用在其中。When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into , if the zone contains a control, the deleted control instance is not available in it. 如果控件是在目录中可用，但被删除的实例已被永久删除，用户可以添加一个控件的新实例。The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性上的控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 若要运行的代码示例，您需要的示例部分中的所有代码属性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分取自分部类，并包含 delete 谓词是启用还是禁用状态之间切换的代码。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the delete verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 代码示例的另一部分是承载自定义控件并包含用户界面 (UI) 的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 请注意，声明性``区域中的元素设置表示 delete 谓词在谓词下拉菜单中的特定文本控件。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the delete verb in the verbs drop-down menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，将页切换到目录显示模式，并添加`TextDisplayWebPart`到页面的控件。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 可以使用复选框来启用和禁用 delete 谓词`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，但该谓词出现在菜单仅在页处于目录或设计显示模式下时。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the delete verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, but the verb appears on the menu only while the page is in catalog or design display mode. 如果单击**删除 web 部件**菜单上的谓词，永久删除该控件，并且已删除的实例不能添加回页面。If you click the **Delete WebPart** verb on the menu, the control is permanently deleted, and the deleted instance cannot be added back to the page. 但是，您可以将页返回到目录显示模式，并添加的新实例`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。However, you can return the page to catalog display mode, and add a new instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性，以区别属性尚未设置的情况下和它已设置为空字符串 ("")。The property overrides the base property to distinguish between cases where the property has not been set and those where it has been set to an empty string (""). 如果未设置该属性，该区域不包含任何控件，当 Web 部件页将输入到显示模式的区域是可见的默认值特定于区域性的短信将显示在一个空控件。If the property has not been set and the zone contains no controls, when a Web Parts page enters into a display mode where the zone is visible, a default culture-specific text message appears in an empty control. 如果有意为空字符串，设置属性值，然后在空区域中不显示任何文本消息。If the property value has intentionally been set to an empty string, then no text message appears in an empty zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用属性上的控件。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页，请参阅类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，属性具有声明性标记中分配给它的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 此值将出现在`WebPartZone2`，在将页加载到浏览器中，将页切换到设计显示模式，并将显示从日期控件拖`WebPartZone2`到`WebPartZone1`。This value will appear in `WebPartZone2`, after you load the page into a browser, switch the page into design display mode, and drag the control that displays the date from `WebPartZone2` into `WebPartZone1`. 更改 Web 部件页中的显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[演练：更改显示模式同时适用于 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on changing display modes in a Web Parts page, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性可以以声明方式或以编程方式访问。The property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. 你可以通过访问它以声明方式在区域内使用``元素中设置文本、 说明、 是否启用谓词，以及其他属性。You can access it declaratively within a zone by using the `` element to set the text, the description, whether the verb is enabled, and other attributes. 它不需要声明一个区域，但是，帮助谓词，因为默认情况下启用。It is not necessary to declare a help verb for a zone, however, because it is enabled by default. 需要启用要显示的谓词菜单上的帮助谓词的唯一步骤在运行时区域中的控件是将值赋给为单独控件。The only step that is necessary to enable a help verb to appear on the verbs menu of controls in a zone at run time is to assign a value to the property for individual controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性上的控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 对于此代码示例工作，除了与下面的代码中，你需要自定义控件。For the code example to work, in addition to the following code, you need a custom control. 可以使用自己的控件，也可以使用自定义代码`TextDisplayWebPart`控件中的示例部分找到类概述。You can either use your own control, or use the code for the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含用户控件，使你能够更改网页上的显示模式。This code example includes a user control to enable you to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式，并在此控件中的源代码的详细信息，请参阅[演练：更改显示模式同时适用于 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). span.span: An value that determines how controls in a zone are arranged.

value.span: 默认方向为 。

span.span: The default orientation is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性涉及 Web 部件控件区域中的布局方式。The property concerns how Web Parts controls are laid out in a zone. 默认值方向，将控件呈现上到下排列方式，根据每个控件的值。With the default orientation, the controls are rendered in a top-to-bottom arrangement, according to the value of each control. 使用方向，这些控件的排列并排显示，该区域的宽度。With a orientation, the controls are arranged side by side, subject to the width of the zone. Internet Explorer 可能会影响的高度控制和包含它的区域的高度。Internet Explorer can affect the height of a control, and the height of the zone that contains it. Internet Explorer 呈现网页中的兼容性模式 （与早期浏览器版本向后兼容），或在标准模式下 (由是否存在`DOCTYPE`页中的声明)。Internet Explorer renders web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions), or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page). 有关这些模式的信息，请参阅 DHTML[仍然可以](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)属性。For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property. 当 Internet Explorer 呈现在标准模式下的页面时，在某些情况下它并没有进行调整单元格在表中，即使单元格的 HTML 标记为``。When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, in some scenarios it does not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is ``. 因此， ，使控件不会拉伸该区域的最大高度为呈现控件和其包含的区域。As a result, controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone. 两种情况下会发生这种类型的呈现。This type of rendering occurs in two cases. - 当一个区域属性设置为，且在该区域上显式设置的高度。When a zone's property is set to , and you explicitly set the height on the zone. 若要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，不要指定水平区域的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontal zone. - 当一个区域属性设置为，并且未显式设置区域 （或所包含的控件） 的高度。When a zone's property is set to , and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone (or of the contained controls). 若要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，垂直区域中设置的区域或控件的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertical zone. 本主题中的代码示例演示如何正常使用属性。The code example in this topic demonstrates normal usage of the property. 有关代码示例来演示高度相关的呈现问题以及如何解决此问题，请参阅属性。For a code example that demonstrates the height-related rendering issue and how to work around it, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式将属性上的控件。The following code example demonstrates the declarative and programmatic use of the property on a control. 有关完整代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页，请参阅类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，属性具有声明性标记中分配给它的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 此值会影响`WebPartZone1`之后将页加载到浏览器。This value impacts `WebPartZone1`, after you load the page into a browser. 水平呈现在区域中的 Web 部件控件。The Web Parts controls in the zone are rendered horizontally. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#2)] 可以单击**切换布局方向**按钮来更改该区域的方向。You can click the **Toggle Layout Orientation** button to change the orientation of the zone. 若要切换方向代码出现在分部类从下面的代码示例。The code to toggle the orientation occurs in the following code example from the partial class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，您可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, you can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法重写基方法以加载状态的谓词和区域中的谓词菜单派生自类。The method overrides the base method to load state for the verbs and the verbs menu in a zone derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于没有自定义具有谓词菜单中的对象及其属性值设置为`true`。The property applies only when there is a custom object in a verbs menu that has its property value set to `true`. 中包含的样式特性属性属于的菜单中的谓词的文本旁边显示的选中标记图像的样式。The style attributes contained in the property pertain to the style of the check mark image that appears next to the verb's text in the menu. 每个控件中区域具有其自己的谓词菜单标题栏中。Each control in a zone has its own verbs menu in its title bar. 谓词菜单可以包含 Web 部件控件集和自定义中包含这两个标准谓词由开发人员创建的对象。The verbs menu can contain both standard verbs included in the Web Parts control set, and custom objects created by developers. 中的标准谓词控制谓词菜单-包括用于导出、 删除和打开帮助谓词页，即单操作谓词来执行其任务一次并完成。The standard verbs in a control verbs menu--including the verbs for exporting, deleting, and opening a Help page--are single-action verbs that carry out their tasks once and are done. 其中任何一个指示任何种类的持续状态在于无需进行过标记在菜单中有一个复选标记，这些谓词。There is no need to ever mark these verbs in the menu with a check mark, because none of them indicate any sort of continuing state. 因此，无法设置这些谓词的属性，并属性不适用于它们根本。Therefore, the property on these verbs cannot be set, and the property does not apply to them at all. 但是，开发人员可以创建自定义可能通过设置表示带有复选标记，执行完状态的控件及其属性设置为`true`。However, developers can create a custom control that might indicate a continuing state with a check mark, by setting its property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用的最小化谓词属性将显示在每个谓词菜单区域中的控件。The minimize verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs menu of each control in a zone. 谓词出现在所有页显示模式。The verb appears in all page display modes. 最小化控件折叠到较小的、 但仍将该控件的标题栏显示，和使得还原谓词在标题栏中可见。Minimizing a control collapses it down to a smaller size, leaves only the title bar of the control visible, and makes a restore verb visible in the title bar. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性上的控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 若要运行的代码示例，您需要的示例部分中的所有代码属性。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分取自分部类中，并包含最小化谓词是启用还是禁用状态之间切换的代码。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the minimize verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 代码示例的另一部分是承载自定义的网页控件，并包含用户界面 (UI)。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 请注意，声明性``区域中的元素设置的值`Description`属性时用户将鼠标指针定位通过谓词在谓词菜单中显示的工具提示的文本。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the value for the `Description` attribute text, which appears as a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb in the verbs menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，将页切换到目录显示模式，并添加`TextDisplayWebPart`控制转移到页上，如果尚未添加。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added. 可以使用复选框来启用和禁用最小化谓词`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the minimize verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 当启用谓词时，还可以单击它以最小化控件。When the verb is enabled, you can also click it to minimize the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写方法在派生区域要添加其他类的区域中的标准谓词的集合的对象。You can override the method in a derived zone class to add additional objects to the collection of standard verbs in your zone. 您可以执行此操作通过将谓词添加到集合中属性。You can do this by adding verbs to the collection in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一种创建处理程序方法事件通过重写方法将自定义谓词添加到派生区域。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 代码示例包含两个源文件。The code example contains two source files. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 代码示例的第一部分是的一个简单的控件派生自的源代码类。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 代码示例的第二部分是为派生的源代码重写的区域方法将自定义谓词添加到区域。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 该代码还在谓词菜单中的创建将显示自定义谓词控件包含在该区域，并且此谓词创建另一个副本的当前控件。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 代码示例的第三个部分是承载派生的区域的网页和控件。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 页面顶部附近是`Register`指令以引用派生的区域的组件。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果在浏览器页面加载控件出现在该区域。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 单击谓词菜单中，然后单击**CopyWebPart**谓词，并创建控件的副本。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将呈现页眉和页脚区域之间的主要内容区域并且包含某个区域的正文区控件。The method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法重写基方法中的类以提供专用的呈现的布局和样式属性应用于区域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply uniquely to zones. 该方法将呈现包含正文，响应正文的全部内容的表并在该表中，设置不同的属性值，具体取决于各种条件，包括是否属性设置为垂直或水平，以及是否页当前正在设计的显示模式。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including whether the property is set to vertical or horizontal, and whether the page is currently in design display mode.

[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，将页切换到目录显示模式，并添加`TextDisplayWebPart`控制转移到页上，如果尚未添加。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added. 使用最小化谓词最小化控件，并记下还原谓词变得可见。Use the minimize verb to minimize the control, and note that the restore verb becomes visible. 可以使用复选框来启用和禁用还原谓词。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the restore verb.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件谓词表示用户可以在 Web 部件页，例如最小化、 关闭或还原的控件; 的用户界面 (UI) 中执行的操作将控件添加到页;或取消操作。Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action. 在 UI 中由可单击对象，可以设置显示为超链接、 图像或按钮通过使用该对象表示谓词属性。A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button by using the property. 属性适用于仅在区域级别，而不是存在于每个谓词中存在的谓词区域中的控件。The property applies to verbs that exist only at the zone level, as opposed to verbs that exist in each of the controls in a zone. 例如，在一个页面切换到目录模式或编辑模式时，区域级别的谓词中有仅适用于整个区域级别的操作的区域的页脚。For example, when you switch a page into catalog mode or edit mode, there are zone-level verbs in the footers of the zones that apply only to actions at the level of the entire zone. 属性应用时使用较旧的 （"下层"） 浏览器访问此 Web 部件页。The property is applied when the Web Parts page is accessed with an older ("down-level") browser. 必须将值赋给导致图像显示在其区域中该动词的每个特定谓词的属性。You must assign a value to the property for each specific verb to cause an image to appear for that verb in its zone. 如果未提供图像的 URL，该谓词的属性的默认值为。If you do not provide the URL to an image, the verb's property defaults to . 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以包含对直接继承的控件的引用类，以及其他 ASP.NET 服务器控件或在区域内的自定义控件。The property can contain references to controls that inherit directly from the class, as well as other ASP.NET server controls or custom controls within a zone. 动态设置的 Web 部件控件包装不是任何控件控制作为控制在运行时; 此机制，可以使用所有类型的 ASP.NET 控件作为 Web 部件控件。The Web Parts control set dynamically wraps any control that is not a control as a control at run time; this mechanism enables you to use all types of ASP.NET controls as Web Parts controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将属性上的控件。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property on a control. 有关完整代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和包含在此代码中，该区域的.aspx 页，请参阅类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 下面的代码示例访问属性以编程方式，并显示列表中包含的控件`WebPartZone1`。The following code example accesses the property programmatically and displays a list of the controls contained in `WebPartZone1`. 将页加载到浏览器后，单击标记为按钮**列表 WebPartZone1 web 部件**。After you load the page into a browser, click the button labeled **List WebPartZone1 WebParts**. 显示的 Id 和类型的控件。The IDs and types of the controls are displayed.
